Google said last month co-founder Larry Page would take over as chief executive from April 4 while Eric Schmidt would assume the role of executive chairman. . Nokia's chief executive is Stephen Elop , the former president of Microsoft's business division who left last year. In an open letter written by Microsoft Chief Executive Steve Ballmer and Stephen Elop , the two said, There are other mobile ecosystems. We will disrupt them. The two companies say they will combine services, such as Nokia Maps with Microsoft's search engine Bing and ad platform AdCenter. Microsoft would provide developer tools to software developers building for Nokia phones. Nokia
